item.title: LyonHacks Season II
item.description: #chapter p { font-size: 1.05rem !important; line-height: 1.6rem !important; } Virtual Hackathon | This event ended on April 17th, 2022.A full 78 hours after we started on Friday, our hackathon is officially over! Whether you picked up a new skill, explored some programming concepts, or just messed around with your friends, we hope everyone has had an enjoyable time during LyonHacks II! With that being said, our judging team has finished reviewed all your submissions, and we’re excited to present…

item.title: Legacy Events
item.description: Old iterations and winners of William Lyon Mackenzie C.I.’s Annual Hackathon. Past Events LyonHacks I (2021)
